entries.title: Dead Space patch fixes annoying fuzzy textures one day after Digital Foundry callout
entries.description: A patch so quick I can barely notice the difference.

entries.title: Rumbleverse, the wrestling battle royale, is shutting down only six months after launch
entries.description: Another live service casualty.

entries.title: AI company promises changes after 'voice cloning' tool used to make celebrities say awful things
entries.description: Who could have predicted this? Literally, anyone.

entries.title: This Fallout 4 synth power armor mod looks so sick it makes me want to join the Institute
entries.description: Father, I'm home!

entries.title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor just got delayed, but not by much
entries.description: Respawn says it needs six weeks to apply extra polish.

entries.title: Terraria devs want 2023 to be 'the year of Terraria crossplay'
entries.description: The Terraria team is currently working on another update for this year, after 2022's huge Labor of Love.

entries.title: Threadlings? Tangles? Lashes? New Destiny 2: Lightfall trailer focuses on exotic gear and Strand effects
entries.description: It ain't easy being green (but it is lethal).

entries.title: Sony, Microsoft and Nintendo give E3 the brush off
entries.description: Gaming's biggest publishers aren't coming back for E3's first in-person event since 2019.

entries.title: Overwatch 2 will finally let players earn skins for free again
entries.description: An old currency is coming back from the dead.

entries.title: In 3 months this Konami game is disappearing forever
entries.description: It only came out in April 2022, and those who bought it are not happy.

entries.title: Sims 4 is finally turning babies into real Sims on March 14
entries.description: It's time for infants to get a life.

entries.title: The next Sims game 'is not an MMO' Maxis clarifies
entries.description: Sorry, Sims Online hopefuls.

entries.title: Corsair just made power supplies interesting, which I didn't realize was possible
entries.description: The RMx Shift is looking to make building your PC easier.

entries.title: Invisible players run rampant in Escape from Tarkov—'What an absolute circus'
entries.description: A game about camping is currently plagued by the ultimate camping tool.

entries.title: Industries of Titan review
entries.description: There's fun to be had here for ruthless CEOs, but it quickly runs out of steam.

entries.title: Avatar: The Way of Water sucks, but it made me really excited about Ubisoft's upcoming game
entries.description: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora could be brilliant if it leans into the universe's many oddities.

entries.title: Marvel Snap gets long-awaited battle mode and live balance changes
entries.description: Now you can drop a Killmonger on all your 1-power friends.

entries.title: Civ 6 streamer figures out how to win without founding any cities in 'extremely impressive' video
entries.description: Boesthius' challenge run even caught the attention of the official Civ account.

entries.title: Cyberpunk 2077 patch delivers DLSS 3 ahead of painstakingly extreme ray tracing mode
entries.description: DLSS 3 support should give us a bit of headroom when it comes to ray tracing performance.

entries.title: How to open Hitman Freelancer safes
entries.description: Get your hands on some extra Mercers.

entries.title: Japan officially designates today Final Fantasy 7 Day
entries.description: Today is the 26th anniversary of FF7's Japanese PS1 release, and Japan's decided to make things official.

entries.title: Sony's expecting a severe drop in PSVR 2 sales from a projected 2 million
entries.description: Now Sony is reportedly staring down a number closer to 1.5 million high-end VR headsets in the first year.

entries.title: American Truck Simulator is going where the buffalo roam in its upcoming expansion
entries.description: The community isn't sure about Kansas, but I can't wait to cruise its highways.

entries.title: Wordle hint and answer today: Let's solve #591, January 31
entries.description: Trouble solving today's Wordle? Here's the help you need.

entries.title: This LOL Verifier checks to make sure you actually laughed
entries.description: No more three letter lies.

entries.title: New 16 Core Intel Arc desktop GPU may be on the cards
entries.description: This doesn't look like the A580, so could be something new.

entries.title: Dead Space fans think 'indecipherable' New Game+ log points to more remakes in the future
entries.description: Fans believe the text, found in a New Game+ log, refers to events in Dead Space 2 and 3.

entries.title: This hilarious game is made of 56 frantic minigames that you only need a single button to play
entries.description: Run a gauntlet of 56 ridiculous minigames that only use the A button in Super 56.
